Text: Thankyou thankyou! so much i don't have tv anymore and your uploads are a life saver . thankyou for doing all this.

Just like what aeropolkadots said in the first post, we are all waiting for and expecting HD clips of this show from you, nelwyn.  We are now in the world of HD and the standard quality would not be good enough.  Thanks for everything that you put up for the past Jon & Kate Plus 8 and this series, nelwyn.

Thank You VERY MUCH nelwyn!  If it wern't for your uploads I would not be able to watch this at all till they finally decide to put on ON DEMAND!  I really appreciate you taking the time to do it!  Thanks again! Keep up the great work :)
Your the cool mountain which brings forth Kate and her brood. Keep on truckin. Girlfriends gonna give me sugar pie now thanks.
